creator: ajrieke@yahoo.com
text:
Attempting to limit which files are downloaded using
nested <fileset> <date> elements fails with these
elements.  This may also exist in 1.5.1 or 1.5.2 -- I haven't
checked.

This would be a nice feature.  Ideally, it would be fixed.
Since it doesn't work, it should at least be a disallowed option.
<ftp>
 <fileset> 
   <date datetime="${DATE}" when="after"/>

creator: antoine@apache.org
text:
I am going to add a warning that selectors are not supported in the ftp task.
I have also added a line about this in the documentation.
Selectors in their present form require instances of File, not FTPFile.
Really fixing this problem involves deep changes which should be discussed on 
the development list.
A real fix for this issue should be delayed until ant 1.7

I have added the warning concerning the non support of selectors in the ftp 
task. I am closing the bug report for now.
